signature: public int isMatch(final CharSequence buffer, final int start, final int bufferStart, final int bufferEnd)
name: isMatch
javadoc:
/**
 * Checks if the character at the specified position in the given buffer matches a whitespace character.
 *
 * @param buffer the input buffer to check
 * @param start the index of the character to check within the buffer
 * @param bufferStart the starting index of the buffer (not used)
 * @param bufferEnd the ending index of the buffer (not used)
 * @return 1 if the character is a whitespace, 0 otherwise
 */

name: size
javadoc:
/**
 * Returns the number of elements in this collection.
 *
 * @return the number of elements in this collection
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Returns the number of elements in this collection, if it contains no elements then it returns 0.
 *
 * @return an integer containing the number of elements in this collection
 */
